remarks: Existential quantification restricted to a support.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 27-May-2019.)
statement:
rexsupp $p |- ( ( F Fn X /\ X e. V /\ Z e. W ) -> ( E. x e. ( F supp Z ) ph <-> E. x e. X ( ( F ` x ) =/= Z /\ ph ) ) ) $.
$d F x $.
$d V x $.
$d W x $.
$d X x $.
$d Z x $.
